title: Nimblex Dictionary
description: Blazing fast C++ dictionary for the Terminal:
• Trie (prefix tree) representation for fast search and autocomplete.
• Fuzzy search using Levenshtein distance with dynamic programming.
• Interactive GUI using ncurses library.

title: Paxos Decentralized Database
description: • Created distributed key-value database in Python with full replication across nodes.
• Used Multi-Paxos algorithm to reach consensus, backed by private blockchain and disk backup to prevent tampering and ensure fault-tolerance.
• Made separate server and client nodes so users can interact with the database without hosting data.
